name: Space Cheon-ma 3077
author: Sanha
content: Qi, swords, martial artistsâ€¦ and robots and spaceships?! The year is 3077, thousands of years after the heyday of the martial arts realm. Humanity inhabits the stars, governed by interstellar martial arts organizations who kept the old ways of the realm alive: might makes right! For bounty hunters like Seryeong, Robert, and Sunja, this means trouble is good for business, except when they bite off more than they can chew. After venturing to the irradiated wasteland of Earth for a top bounty, only
